courses.title: BLOG WEB-APP
courses.description: Developed a fully functional, production grade web application using React.js and appwrite. Implemented features such as user authentication, CRUD operation for blog posts, and integration with the appwrite backend for database management.
courses.instructor: REACT-JS, APPWRITE, REDUX/TOOLKIT, TINYMCE, REACT-HOOK-FORM, TAILWIND CSS

courses.title: TODO WEB-APP
courses.description: Developed a todo web application using React.js. Implemented features such as adding, editing, and deleting tasks, as well as prioritizing tasks and marking them as completed.
courses.instructor: REACT.JS, CONTEXT_API, LOCAL STORAGE, TAILWIND CSS
